name: nyu
text: A comment left by nyu was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Deusoma, NotGodot, chivalress, mustconcentrate, Lumus, Boyd, starch, Panserbjorne, Appers, kestral)

name: spanntastic
text: A comment left by spanntastic was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by waldo913, Semiquaver, SotiCoto)

name: lutipold
text: haha pat is gay ha

name: dans
text: Pat is the gayest

name: ravindra108
text:
Is so gay.

(It had to be done.)

name: arcibi
text: Fucking up your recycling is small-time compared to what Pat has done

name: spinynorman
text: Depends on what county you're in.

name: greyfield
text: Where I come from, mixing up your plastics and papers means hard time. Not jaywalking hard time - assault hard time. People here take their recycling seriously.

name: wurlitzergirl
text: Are you from Seattle?

name: spectre
text: Not to Pat. Recycling is important to Pat. It's one of the many ways he finds to look down on the rest of us.

name: invidious
text: Remember when Pat made headlines by messin' up his recycling so bad that he almost got lethal injection?

name: scorpio_nadir
text: No. Not to Pete. Not at all.

name: rapid_roy
text: This strip has ruined my memories of reading Beverly Cleary books.

name: feetnotes
text: Me too. I used to love them...

name: straw
text: That's odd, it's enhanced mine.

name: bixschmix
text: Ditto. Adds a whole 'nother dimension to Ramona pulling on that little girl's curly hair...

name: gtc
text: Oh Ramona, don't be doin' that with no principal.

name: whuppins
text: Thumbs up for "the Dr. J of murdering people"

name: rowboat
text: I'm very tempted to change my screen name to thedrjofmurderingpeople. Or maybe my first name.

name: soticoto
text: Would have been double thumbs up for Dr Seuss.

name: spenham
text: A comment left by spenham was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by thomgreenwood, Mangtastic, GeyserShitdick, Lutipold)

name: soticoto
text:
Folks don't like me getting chubbed.
Nothin personal to yerself.

name: shownomercy
text: I love this.. Ray all pressed up against the glass, protesting 'since small times man!'

name: rowboat
text: Pat couldn't hear that part.

name: highpitch_83
text: the single paw and the the phone on the glass is epic

name: tombsgrave
text: A comment left by tombsgrave was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by heccibiggs, Unfun, whoper, equinn2006, mystkmanat, STUART)

name: tinhand
text:
"It ain't just like you fucked up your recycling."
...
5/5

name: gumfish
text: Pat is a dick.

name: professoryes
text:
"It ain't just like you fucked up your recycling."

"Remember that time Pat fucked up his recycling so bad they almost gave him the chair?"

name: straw
text: Pat is not the type to ever mess up his recycling ever.

name: vermy
text: He'd probably turn himself in before doing that. Dude loves his earth.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Pat doesn't love the Earth, he just hates people don't.  There's a difference.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
See that above? The comment with the words missing, not making sense?

Ignore that.

name: lahnnabell
text:
Scammin' for Capri Suns. My friends were always scammin' me for freeze pops.

And I'm forever using "since small times".

name: hellofyellin
text: Man, I can't tell you how much I wanted a BMX bike when I was a kid.  Right up there with CrossFire and a PowerWheel.  Couldn't have a PowerWheel though.  I was too big.  Far too big.

name: charchar
text: Man, I was all about the Razor Scooter.  I finally got one and promptly self-destructed on the driveway.  Hells of yellin' 'bout the skinned shinbones.

name: mg7810
text: Not the Michael Jordan or Shaquille O'Neal of murdering people, no. The Dr. J . Perhaps the one-on-one nature of Nice Pete's basketball/killing metaphor reminds Pat of Dr. J vs. Larry Bird One on One

name: relaxing
text: Nice Pete does not power his way through a murder the way Shaq would.  Julius Erving played with more finesse, and truly paved the way for Michael Jordan.

name: mattylite
text: Damn, mg7810, you bringin' up hell of memories of small times for me.  I remember mostly that that game kind of sucked, but yet my memories of not enjoying it are so so fond.

name: droplede
text: Gotta love the alt-text, too: One of those rare occasions where English Beat lyrics can stretch to cover crime and punishment.

name: watt
text: Never do I wish to reach an age where I can't scam for C. Suns.

name: heccibiggs
text: what is your avatar I NEED TO UNDERSTAND

name: carlyle
text: Ramon Quimbly? The, like, ten year old? Pat was one messed up kitten.

name: lolsworth
text:
Holy shit I just found out Beverly Cleary is still alive

She'll be 94 if she sees April 2010

name: erinye
text:
I was at a party last night, and the phrases "since small times" came up several times from different people over the course of the evening.

Has it crept into the common vernacular? Or are we all just gigantic nerds?

name: erinye
text: (phrase singular, I suppose. Girl, sucks, etc.)
